content.prompt: Which of the following is an example of structural unemployment?

choices.label: A computer programmer who leaves her job to move to Florida
A worker who loses his job during a recession
An autoworker who is replaced by a robot
A construction worker who is always unemployed during the winter months
A worker who is engaged in unproductive work

unit.text: 2: Economic Indicators and the Business Cycle
